info.description: This is the API documentation for the Mafia game.
info.title: Mafia API

get.description: Returns all predefined abilities for roles.

put.description: Updates an existing game rule by ID.

delete.description: Deletes a game rule by ID.

post.description: Creates a new scenario with rules and roles.

put.description: Updates an existing scenario by ID.

post.description: Adds a new item to the shop catalog.

put.description: Updates an existing shop item by ID.

delete.description: Deletes an existing shop item by ID.

post.description: Sends a one-time password to authenticate an existing user.
Sends a one-time password to start a new account registration.
Confirms the OTP sent to the user and returns an access token.
post.summary: Verify an OTP code and issue a token

post.description: Creates a new game room for the authenticated user.
Uses a role ability in an active game.
Adds the authenticated user to a room by ID.
Removes the authenticated user from a room by ID.
Advances the game phase for a room.
Starts the game for a given room ID.
Records a vote in an active game.

get.description: Returns all shop items available for purchase.

post.description: Purchases an item from the shop for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves aggregated dashboard information for the authenticated user.
Retrieves the authenticated user's profile details.

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile information.

post.description: Initiates a purchase flow for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's wallet balances.
